personal.name: Louise Ferreira
personal.title: Machine Learning Engineer
personal.bio: Building fair, ethical AI systems to protect marginalized communities. Specializing in NLP, bias detection, and algorithmic justice.

about.lead: I am a multifaceted, deeply reflective, and intellectually audacious Black Brazilian woman whose work pulses with resistance, tenderness, and transformation.
description: Originally from Mesquita in the Baixada Fluminense region of Rio de Janeiro, my story is one of relentless transcendence. I bridge the margins and center of global conversations on power, technology, race, and desire.

My academic trajectory—from International Relations to Cultural Studies and now Artificial Intelligence—is revolutionary. At every stage, I reclaim the right to question: Who defines intelligence? Who is protected in cyberspace? Who gets to feel safe, loved, desired, or heard in the digital age?
Leading design and delivery of AI-enabled MVPs, from topic taggers to intent detection systems
Collaborating with business stakeholders on production-ready ML solutions
Implementing transformer-based models for NLP applications
Integrated Python AI pipeline with C# microservices backend
Developed hybrid chatbot for internal knowledge management
Architected RAG pipeline with HuggingFace and Azure OpenAI
Automated data protection policy monitoring using Microsoft Purview
Investigated anomalous data behaviors to prevent leaks and unauthorized access
Achieved SPOT Award for excellence in data governance

projects.title: Fairness & Governance Framework
projects.description: Developed reusable bias detection and mitigation framework using Fairlearn & AIF360. Prototyped system for quantifying risks in classification models - a key component of ethical AI governance.

projects.title: Cinema Analysis Data Product
projects.description: Built full data product from ingestion to UI, featuring 800+ line Streamlit application powered by custom Python ETL pipeline and normalized SQLite database. Analyzed 140k+ titles.

projects.title: Internal RAG Assistant
projects.description: Led design and implementation of production-level chatbots for document retrieval. Architected Python/Flask and C#/.NET backends with RAG pipeline using HuggingFace and Azure OpenAI.

projects.title: Information Retrieval System
projects.description: Built gold-standard evaluation framework with 20 complex queries. Developed automated precision/recall calculation system for search algorithm improvement.
